name: Asset Tracking   [Notion Template]
description: Streamline your asset management with this Notion template!You can easily manage your assets, categorize them, see where they are located, assign them to employees, and view their status (e.g., available, in use, etc.).Key Features Manage your assets with ease Categorize assets See where assets are located Assign them to employees Check the status of assets (e.g., available, in use, etc.) Easily view key metrics with Notion charts And much more. For whomA physical asset management template is us
features: Manage your assets with ease; Categorize assets; See where assets are located; Assign them to employees; Check the status of assets (e.g., available, in use, etc.); Easily view key metrics with Notion charts; And much more.; This product is a Notion template, so you must have a Notion account to use it. You cansign up for an account here. Notion has plans from FREE to Enterprise!
